main.description: DEPRECATED: Use app.gainforest.dwc.occurrence with basisOfRecord='MachineObservation' instead. A declaration of a flora prediction for an organization.

gbifTaxonKeys.description: An array of GBIF taxon keys for each flora prediction

items.description: The GBIF taxon key of the flora prediction

createdAt.description: The date and time of the creation of the record
